segments.text: David , recently I established a travelling forum , and now I want to make a plan to hold the first activity . Where can we go for this time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many members are there in your forum ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think we can visit West Lake . The landscapes are attractive . It is said that just as there is paradise in heaven , there are Su Thou and Hang Thou on earth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's surely worth going to . There are ten famous spots there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What can we do next after locating the place ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Inform my members to prepare for the travelling . And then we can discuss about the travelling costs .
segments.speaker: S1
